SCREEN.TITLE: Get ready, Holder! AirDrop is coming soon!

AIRDROP.MAIN.SCREEN.SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: The preparation for the AirDrop launch is in full swing. Follow the statuses and updates to stay informed

AIRDROP.DROP.TASKS.SCREEN.SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: Complete the tasks below to participate in the $CITY token AirDrop

LOADER.LOADER.POLISH.COINS: Polishing the coins to a shine…

WELCOME.TITLE: Welcome to CITY Holder!
WELCOME.DESC: Your journey to creating the perfect city begins here. Build and develop your city, attract new residents, and increase your income.

TAXES.TITLE: Collect taxes and replenish the budget
TAXES.DESC: Tap the collect taxes button to receive coins. Taxes accumulate over time, so check in regularly for maximum income.

CONSTRUCTION.TITLE: Build and upgrade buildings in the city
CONSTRUCTION.DESC: Buildings attract new residents and generate income. Upgrade them with coins to level up and increase their efficiency.

FRIENDS.TITLE: Invite friends and earn!
FRIENDS.DESC: Invite friends to CITY Holder and you both will receive a bonus for their registration. The more friends, the more rewards.

LEAGUES.TITLE: Compete with other players in rankings and leagues
LEAGUES.DESC: Increase your city’s population and income to receive valuable rewards. Reach new heights and shine!

AIRDROPS.TITLE: Earn $CITY tokens for your achievements
AIRDROPS.DESC: Active players receive rewards for their in-game achievements at the end of each season

INSTRUCTION.TITLE: Come up with a name for

START.REGISTRATION.PAGE.CHARACTER.DIALOGUE: All teams are ready to work!
START.REGISTRATION.PAGE.ERROR.NAME.TOO.SHORT: City name must contain 3 to 20 letters and must not contain special characters or numbers
START.REGISTRATION.PAGE.ERROR.NAME.INVALID.CHARACTERS: City name can only contain letters and numbers

FINISH.REGISTRATION.PAGE.SUBTITLE: You have become the Holder of your city!
FINISH.REGISTRATION.PAGE.INSTRUCTION: Build residential complexes, shops, entertainment, and industrial facilities. Develop the city to attract as many residents as possible and turn it into a prosperous metropolis

INCOME.COLLECTION.PAGE.SUBTITLE: While you were away, you earned
INCOME.COLLECTION.PAGE.REMINDER: Don't forget to visit the "Friends" section and collect income

HOLDER.LEVEL.UP.PAGE.SUBTITLE: You have received a new title and a new avatar. Your click power has increased. Keep it up, Holder!

TAP.POWER.TITLE: Tap power
TAP.POWER.DESC: Number of coins received per click

CREEN.TITLE: You are tired of collecting taxes

NOT.ENOUGH.ENERGY.PAGE.SUBTITLE: Your energy supply for today is depleted. Energy recovery will resume in <time-countdown>

DAILY.BONUS.PAGE.SUBTITLE: Don't miss your chance to collect coins every day! Collect rewards daily to keep the reward counter going

FRIENDS.SCREEN.FRIENDS.DESCRIPTION: Invite friends to CITY Holder and receive rewards for their registration and progress in the game
FRIENDS.SCREEN.SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: Here you can see how much income your friends and their friends bring you

SCREEN.TITLE: Bonus for leveling up your friends' cities

REFERRAL.INCOME.SCREEN.SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: The higher your friend's city level, the bigger bonus you get when it levels up.

FRIENDS.LEVEL.1.TITLE: Friends of the 1st circle
FRIENDS.LEVEL.1.DESC: 100% Of the bonus when leveling up

FRIENDS.LEVEL.2.TITLE: Friends of the 2nd circle
FRIENDS.LEVEL.2.DESC: 10% Of the bonus when leveling up

FRIENDS.LEVEL.3.TITLE: Friends of the 3rd circle
FRIENDS.LEVEL.3.DESC: 2.5% Of the bonus when leveling up

MAIN.TASKS.SCREEN.SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: Complete tasks to earn more coins and unlock additional features in the game
MAIN.TASKS.SCREEN.DAILY.BONUSES.DESCRIPTION: Enter the game every day and get bonuses

DAILY.BONUSES.SCREEN.SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: Don't miss daily bonuses! Collect them every day to keep progress and increase your bonus size

CONSTRUCTION.FILTERS.SCREEN.NOTFOUND.TITLE: No matches
CONSTRUCTION.FILTERS.SCREEN.NOTFOUND.DESCRIPTION: There are no buildings matching the selected filters in this category

CONSTRUCTION.UNAVAILABLE.SCREEN.REMAINING.CONDITIONS: To unlock the building, the following conditions must be met

BOOSTERS.STATUS.SCREEN.SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Complete tasks to earn more coins and unlock new features in the game

BOOSTER.INSTANT.REFILL.TITLE: Instant Refill
BOOSTER.INSTANT.REFILL.DESC: Instantly refills energy. Can be used 3 times a day

BOOSTER.TURBO.CLICK.TITLE: Turbo Click
BOOSTER.TURBO.CLICK.DESC: Each click in the treasury is doubled for 60 seconds. Up to 3 uses per day

BOOSTERS.PURCHASE.SCREEN.ENERGY.CAP.DESCRIPTION: Permanently increases the maximum energy capacity
BOOSTERS.PURCHASE.SCREEN.RECOVERY.RATE.DESCRIPTION: Permanently increases the treasury recovery rate
BOOSTERS.PURCHASE.SCREEN.TAP.BOT.DESCRIPTION: Automatic assistant that collects taxes in your absence

RANKING.POPUP.SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: As your city grows, you will move to higher leagues. In each league, holders compete based on their city's income. The larger the population of your city, the higher the league. And the higher the income of your city, the higher your rank in the rating.

DELETE.ACCOUNT.SCREEN.DELETE.ACCOUNT.WARNING: Deleting the account is irreversible. The following will be deleted: profile, statistics, and everything you earned.

CITY.POPUP.SCREEN.ABOUT.CITY.DESCRIPTION: In CITY Holder, you participate in creating a simulation of the perfect city. Build and upgrade buildings, providing residents with everything they need.Erect residential houses, entertainment, and industrial complexes. Manage resources efficiently, develop the economy, and attract new residents.Your task is to make the most successful simulation of the city of the future and attract as many residents as possible.

RESIDENT.TITLE: Residential buildings
RESIDENT.DESCRIPTION: Buildings that form the way of life of the population. Attract more residents to the city

COMMERCIAL.TITLE: Commercial buildings
COMMERCIAL.DESCRIPTION: Buildings that create living comfort for the residents of your city

INDUSTRIAL.TITLE: Industrial buildings
INDUSTRIAL.DESCRIPTION: The engines of your city's economy. Provide jobs and stimulate economic growth

CITY.TITLE: City buildings
CITY.DESCRIPTION: Infrastructure and public buildings. Improve the quality of life in your city

SPECIAL.TITLE: Special buildings
SPECIAL.DESCRIPTION: Special buildings that set your city apart from the rest and actively attract tourists and new residents
